segments.text: Hello , I would like to speak with Ryan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is Ryan . How may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ryan , this is Malia , and I am afraid that I am feeling a bit under the weather .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know what the problem is ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a horrible rash from poison oak .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you had it a long time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The doctor said that I probably have had it a few days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you been using anything for it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I bought some over-the-counter lotion , and I am taking an antihistamine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That will probably take care of your symptoms . I â€™ ll see you tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2
